content: <metadata><idinfo><citation><citeinfo><origin>Geospatial Technology Section, Idaho Department of Water Resources</origin><pubdate>20090101</pubdate><title>2002 Irrigated Lands for the Eastern Snake Plain Aquifer (ESPA)</title><geoform>vector digital data</geoform><pubinfo><pubplace>Boise, ID</pubplace><publish>Idaho Department of Water Resources</publish></pubinfo><onlink>http:/idwr.idaho.gov</onlink><onlink>http://www.idwr.idaho.gov/GeographicInfo/</onlink></citeinfo></citation><descript><abstract>Land within the county classified as "irrigated", "non-irrigated", or "semi-irrigated." The classification is based on edited CLU (Common Land Unit) polygons from the Farm Services Administration. "Semi-irrigated" is generally residential land.</abstract><purpose>This data set was generated to use in the calculation of recharge and evapotranspiration in order to calibrate the Eastern Snake Plain Aquifer Hydrologic Model.</purpose><supplinf>The key attribute is "STATUS_2002." The interpretation and classification process is described in detail in the report, "2006 Irrigated Land Classification for the Eastern Snake Plain Aquifer" (https://www.idwr.idaho.gov/Browse/News/WaterCalls/SWC/irrigated-nonirrigated%20by%20county/2006%20irrigated-nonirrigated%20classification%20report.pdf)</supplinf></descript><timeperd><timeinfo><rngdates><begdate>20020501</begdate><enddate>20021130</enddate></rngdates></timeinfo><current>Irrigation status for the 2002 growing season.</current></timeperd><status><progress>Complete</progress><update>As needed</update></status><spdom><bounding><westbc>-115.311656</westbc><eastbc>-110.95249</eastbc><northbc>44.879291</northbc><southbc>41.957893</southbc></bounding></spdom><keywords><theme><themekt>EPA GIS Keyword Thesaurus</themekt><themekey>Regulatory</themekey><themekey>Monitoring</themekey><themekey>Environment</themekey><themekey>Ground Water</themekey><themekey>Water</themekey><themekey>Human</themekey></theme><place><placekt>None</placekt><placekey>Snake Plain Aquifer</placekey><placekey>Snake River Plain</placekey><placekey>Idaho</placekey></place></keywords><accconst>None</accconst><useconst>None</useconst><ptcontac><cntinfo><cntorgp><cntorg>Idaho Department of Water Resources</cntorg><cntper>Margie Wilkins</cntper></cntorgp><cntpos>GIS Analyst</cntpos><cntaddr><addrtype>mailing and physical</addrtype><address>322 East Front Street</address><city>Boise</city><state>ID</state><postal>83720</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>(208) 287-4800</cntvoice><cntfax>(208) 287-6700</cntfax><cntemail>gisinfo@idwr.idaho.gov</cntemail><cntinst>http://www.idwr.idaho.gov/GeographicInfo/</cntinst></cntinfo></ptcontac><datacred>Idaho Department of Water Resources | GIS Section Boise, Idaho</datacred><native>Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3143</native></idinfo><dataqual><lineage><procstep><procdesc>Irrigation status is determined using 2002 Landsat imagery for the following dates:  Path39Row29: 05-25, 06-26, 07-12, 07-28, 08-05, 09-14, 10-08  and   Path39Row30: 05-25, 06-26, 07-12, 07-28, 08-05, 09-14, 10-08  and   Path40Row29: 05-24, 06-25, 07-03, 07-11, 07-27, 08-12, 09-13, 10-15  and   Path40Row30: 05-24, 06-25, 07-03, 07-11, 07-27, 08-12, 09-13, 10-15.   </procdesc><procdate>20000501</procdate></procstep><procstep><procdesc>The creation of this dataset is a multi-year effort. Original linework is from the Farm Service Agency's (FSA) Common Land Unit (CLU) dataset of or around 2006. FSA no longer distributes this data to the public. Project time constraints require acceptance of "less-than-perfectly-accurate" linework. In essence, line work deemed "close enough" to ground truth is acceptable for Eastern Snake Plain Aquifer (ESPA) modeling purposes. Attribute assignments for irrigation status (irrigated, non-irrigated, and semi-irrigated) are determined using available Landsat imagery as background reference.  Landsat imagery is typically 30-meter (l5) or 15-meter (l7) resolution. National Agriculture Inventory Program (NAIP) imagery, Digital Ortho Photo Quadrangle (DOQQ) imagery, and other in-house, scanned aerial imagery is used for determining irrigation status and refining linework geometry. This dataset extends beyond the Eastern Snake Plain Aquifer Model boundary (ESPAM2). Line and attribute correctness is more accurate within ESPAM2 boundary.</procdesc><procdate>20121201</procdate></procstep></lineage></dataqual><spdoinfo><direct>Vector</direct><ptvctinf><sdtsterm><sdtstype>Complete chain</sdtstype><ptvctcnt>239869</ptvctcnt></sdtsterm></ptvctinf></spdoinfo><eainfo><detailed><enttyp><enttypl>CLU_02_ESPA_061213</enttypl><enttypd>Vector polygons which represent features with discrete boundaries</enttypd><enttypds>ESRI</enttypds></enttyp><attr><attrlabl>OBJECTID</attrlabl><attrdef>Internal feature number.</attrdef><attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs><attrdomv><udom>Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.</udom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>ACRES</attrlabl><attrdef>area in acres - must be updated manually</attrdef><attrdefs>IDWR</attrdefs><attrdomv><udom>Positive real numbers that must be manually calculated</udom></attrdomv><attrvai><attrva>Positive real numbers that must be manually calculated</attrva></attrvai></attr><attr><attrlabl>Shape</attrlabl><attrdef>Feature geometry.</attrdef><attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs><attrdomv><udom>Coordinates defining the features.</udom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>STATUS_2002</attrlabl><attrdomv><edom><edomv>irrigated</edomv><edomvd>areas shows evidence of being irrigated</edomvd><edomvds>IDWR</edomvds></edom></attrdomv><attrdomv><edom><edomv>non-irrigated</edomv><edomvd>area does not show evidence of being irrigated</edomvd><edomvds>IDWR</edomvds></edom></attrdomv><attrdomv><edom><edomv>semi-irrigated</edomv><edomvd>residential area</edomvd><edomvds>IDWR</edomvds></edom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>Shape_Length</attrlabl><attrdef>Length of feature in internal units.</attrdef><attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs><attrdomv><udom>Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.</udom></attrdomv></attr><attr><attrlabl>Shape_Area</attrlabl><attrdef>Area of feature in internal units squared.</attrdef><attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs><attrdomv><udom>Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.</udom></attrdomv></attr></detailed></eainfo><metainfo><metd>20130627</metd><metc><cntinfo><cntorgp><cntorg>IDWR</cntorg><cntper>Margie Wilkins</cntper></cntorgp><cntpos>GIS Analyst</cntpos><cntaddr><addrtype>mailing</addrtype><address>322 East Front Street</address><city>Boise</city><state>ID</state><postal>83720-0098</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>208-287-4800</cntvoice><cntemail>margie.wilkins@idwr.idaho.gov</cntemail></cntinfo></metc><metstdn>FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata</metstdn><metstdv>FGDC-STD-001-1998</metstdv><mettc>local time</mettc></metainfo></metadata>
